ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when the camels in foal are neglected,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The ten-month pregnant female camels are abandoned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: when the ten-months pregnant camels shall be abandoned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: the young barren camels are abandoned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when milch camels roam abandoned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when the pregnant she-camels are neglected;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when the camels are left untended,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when the pregnant camels shall be neglected,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the camels big with young are abandoned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: when ten-month pregnant camels are left untended,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when the she-camels big with young shall be abandoned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when the pregnant camels are neglected,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the she-camels, ten months with young, are left untended;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the pregnant she-camels shall be neglected;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: when the pregnant camels are neglected,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when full-term she-camels are neglected
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:4] and when the pregnant camels are neglected, abandoned without a herdsman or anyone to milk them, on   account of the matter that has come over them — even though [previously] no wealth was dearer to them than these [pregnant camels];
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when the camels big with young are abandoned) because they are preoccupied with their own selves,
